about.summary: Experienced Software Engineer with expertise in full-stack development, microservices architecture, and mobile application development. Skilled in a variety of programming languages and frameworks with a focus on creating efficient, scalable, and user-friendly applications. Proficient in payment integrations including PayPal, and experienced with Express, Node.js, and NestJS frameworks. IELTS score of 7.5 demonstrating strong communication skills.

highlights.text: Enhanced Reporting System (Microservices, pagination and API Pooling): Collaborated in a high-performing team of 5 developers to significantly improve the bank's reporting system. Employed Jest to write unit tests for the frontend components used within the reporting system, ensuring responsiveness and user-friendly interaction.

Used BIRT for report generation and API pooling to optimize performance when handling large datasets, enabling efficient printing of a high volume of reports. Reduced report printing time by 40% for datasets exceeding 10,000 records while allowing user to print old records.
Introduced pagination for user-friendly navigation of extensive reports.

Contributed to the system's performance upgrade by leveraging microservices architecture. This involved building the statement generation functionality as a microservice, promoting scalability and maintainability. Increased system capacity to handle concurrent report requests by 2x.

Demonstrated Full-Stack Expertise: Built robust backend services using Quarkus to power the reporting system's functionalities and ensure efficient data processing. Utilized Vuex and XState to manage transitions and state for a responsive and user-friendly frontend experience. Moved to Higher order functions (HOC) to employee micro-frontend design enhancing application robustness.
Loan Originating System: Developed a web application for loan origination using ASP.NET Core MVC and SQL Server. Significantly improved system performance by digitizing the Excel-based solution.

courses: Programming a server with NodeJS and Express
React router, custom hooks, styling app with CSS and webpack

projects.title: Full stack E-commerce Application using Next.js
projects.description: Implemented e-commerce features such as featured products, latest products, add to cart functionality, Stripe checkout, and optimized responsive design for an improved user experience.

projects.title: Final Year Project (FYP) ‚Äì Learning Management System
projects.description: Designed, developed, and unit-tested a scalable mobile application using Flutter for a school of 300+ students. Built a robust Django backend to handle user authentication, data storage, and API communication for the mobile application. Integrated a WhatsApp API to automate announcement and result delivery, improving communication efficiency between school and users.

projects.title: Portfolio Website with Glitch Effects
projects.description: Created a modern portfolio website with glitch effects, animated hex rain, and lightning effects. Built with React and TailwindCSS, featuring responsive design and interactive UI elements.

database: SQL (including SQL Server, DB2, MySQL, and SQLite)
